description:
Ohtenkun lures Bunchu toward the Buseioh. Taikobo, Yozen, and Tenka also arrive, and Ohtenkun activates the paopei Kosuijin right in front of them. In it they see the Forbidden Palace cloaked in red mist... and Bunchu facing off with the Buseioh. Meanwhile, Ohtenkun`s scheme brings a certain memory to Genshi Tenson`s mind. It happened 2,000 years ago...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Brave Warrior`s Soul Is Released
Un vaillant combattant rejoint la tour de Hôshin
